issue.title: Windows compilation errors related to WideAngleCamera

content.raw:
Ok, it seems like a good idea to mention that you work on something to avoid redundant work (I should note this for future).

I have not tested it on windows but it should fix mentioned compile errors (and a few others of the same type).

https://bitbucket.org/0xb000/gazebo/branches/compare/0xb000/gazebo:wideanglecamera%0Dosrf/gazebo:default#diff
